title: A little concerned about Lamb's look in her Shadowfire skin.
body:
http://www.newsoflegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/Kindred_1.jpg

I don't think the slender waist is good for her. I'm not saying she's sexualized, because she's not. I'm saying that she's a little too humanized, being that the artists are trying to make her look too human in shape. When I think of a mythical lamb, I imagine fluffy wool and graceful movements.

I think they need to widen Lamb's waist a bit. I'm not saying get rid of her curves entirely, just make it so her waist isn't so narrow.

replies.body: She looks like Midna from Twilight Princess more than a human imho.
Now that you mention it she does bring a fiery Midna to mind. However the proportions aren't the same.

At this point (Shadowfire skin) she's not really a lamb nor is the wolf really a wolf.
They just take forms.
why do people care about these details

There is no explanation for why people care. They just do. Similar to to why people just don't want something at a point of time. They have no reason for not wanting something, they simply do not want it.

The thing is that its not just her splash art,her ingame model is also slender like this.
So they'd need to change that as well and I doubt they'll do that.
They can't spend 20 minutes tweeking the polies of her model? It seriously is that easy based on my own modeling experience.

I said I doubt they'll do that,since it would require them to change the regular model,the skin-model and their splash arts.
They did already adress a change regarding the "blueness" of the lamb and I simply doubt they'll change the bodyshape of it this late in the pbe cycle.

Also the regular lamb looks kinda fluffy,despite having a thin waist(because her upper body is quite fluffy) and the skin doesn't depict her as a lamb,but as an angelic creature,so her being fluffy isn't really needed anyway.

Now that you mention it, you do have a point. Her waist does look a bit TOO hourglass like. Like her top half and bottom half are slowly separating. Meanwhile if you look at the original splash, she doesn't have the hourglass at all. OP may have a point to widen her waist a bit...

While I don't entirely care about this, I think I agree with OP-widen the waist a bit.

edit: ok someone mentioned the ingame model looking like this as well and since the splash does look like that, I guess its fine.....idk lol.
She's the same in her base skin..
I agree that would look much more appropriate, although it still looks decent.
